channel.title: Michigan Basketball on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in Michigan Basketball on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: Michigan 87, Kansas 85 (OT)
item.description: Michigan goes on to the Elite 8 in the 2013 NCAA March Madness tournament. I was watching Twitter and saw this   zomg zomg zomg — netmeg (@netmeg) March 30, 2013 so I tuned in using TuneIn with just a little bit of overtime left. It helped of course that #goblue was trending on Twitter. Michigan 87, Kansas 85 -- final — The Detroit News (@detroitnews) March 30, 2013 MGoBlog's postgame "
